name: Shrinker
description:
This is the arena shooter game where your ammo determines the difficulty.

Game features:

  • The dynamic arena which size is based on your current ammo
  • Manage your ammo and use some tricks to keep the arena big
  • Go nuts and use the arena as a deadly weapon (but try not to die)
  • Death is inevitable, but try to squeeze every bit out of that tim

The game was created under less than 48 hours for Ludum Dare #42
